title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 134.11 - Permit issuance annual limitation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 134.11 - Permit issuance annual limitation

State Regulations
(a) The department may issue a maximum of 250 permits annually for advertising sign
structure pursuant to this Part, unless an acute need for additional permits is
identified by the Commissioner of Transportation pursuant to subdivision (b) of
this section. (b) The annual
limitation may be increased upon a determination by the department that the
additional annual permits for vegetation should be issued on an individual
basis upon demonstration of acute need. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
134.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
